segments.text: The ink should be next to the paper clips and thumb tacks in the stationary section , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've looked for , but I didn't see any black ink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I'm afraid there's none in stock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'll settle for blue-black . I'll also take a dozen airmail envelopes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They come in packages of ten or twenty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me a package of twenty , then . And where do I find shoelaces ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I never can find my way around this store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . It took me three weeks , and I work here .
segments.speaker: S2
